wikipedia_page.main: Edward Felix Baxter VC (18 September 1885 – 18 April 1916) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: * April 28 – Edward Felix Baxter, English recipient of the Victorian Cross (b. 1885)
